website_summaries.verdict: This mid-sized pot offers durable construction and can be used in a variety of ways in the kitchen.
pros: 32-quart size, with other size options (24-quart, 40-quart) also available
In addition to seafood, this pot can be put to a number of uses, from home-brewing to deep frying a turkey
Stainless steel construction with a nice satin finish
cons: The strainer is in the form of an bottom insert only, with no handle to pull it completely out
Some reports of the bottom arriving warped

website_summaries.verdict: A thick, heavy-duty pot that's good for steaming tamales and many other foods. Its bottom may be slightly convex, though, so it may rattle a bit.
pros: Made of high quality stainless steel
Satin finish stainless steel doesn't stain or rust
cons: Its bottom is not perfectly flat, so it's better with gas stoves than flat electric cooktops

customer_reviews.title: Not For Stovetop Cooking
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the money, but do not plan on using it on flat topped rangetop, as bottom is slightly convex and it will dance off stove when heavy applied. Cannot return because I tried to"fix" it. Works great on outdoor propane burner. Will hold about 16 crab leg clusters, steamed in 12 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: GLH

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality, thin pot.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this purchase. We received a poorly made, thin walled pot. It arrived with rust patches on the outside and it was warped so that the lid doesn't fit properly. The metal is so thin, I cut my finger on the sharp edge on the top of the pot! Complete waste of money, I would have been better off buying one from Costco
customer_reviews.author: Vicki J

customer_reviews.title: Well cunstructed pot, best 40 qt for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed sturdy feeling pot. I’m using this for home brewing beer, I’ve only used it for one batch so far but looks like it will last a long time. The only reason I deducted a star was because there are no gallon markers on the pot to tell how much liquid is in there which may not be an issue at all for other applications but is a must for home brewing. For the price I think this is the best 40 qt pot you can get. I will just have to make the gallon marks myself.
customer_reviews.author: Corinna Black

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 40 quart Gas One and I rarely purchase items that have so few reviews but I took a chance because of the price and the weight of the pot made it seem like it should be heavy duty. I purchased this for home beer brewing and could not be more Satisfied. This pot is heavy duty and the handles are great. Did my first brew last week and it was super easy to clean. My buddy also brews and helped me with my brew and is planning on upgrading his pot to the gas one. I would highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Don Owens

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel
customer_reviews.text: Have only used this pot twice to cook turkey's in. The pot was cleaned as soon as it cooled down enough to remove the oil. I had read some reviews and a problem with pitting was mentioned. Yes after two uses I have pitting in the pot.
customer_reviews.author: just me

customer_reviews.title: BIG pot and no tarnish
customer_reviews.text: Not all that glitters is gold....and that's because this is silver! Well, more like stainless steel :-). I am just very happy with this purchase for my home brewing projects!
customer_reviews.author: E.V. Tosh

customer_reviews.title: outstanding heavy pot
customer_reviews.text: this is a really heavy pot not like those thin pots that they sell in department stores.If you are looking for a good pot spend a little bit more and get this pot you will be glad you did
customer_reviews.author: Rick B.

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Solid. Handled a 20lb turkey without a problem. Looking forward to the lobster boil.
customer_reviews.author: K. Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Only used a few times before holes developed in the bottom of the pot
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I am extremely disappointed in this pot. The bottom is so thin that discoloration and pitting began to appear on the bottom after the first use. It did not take long for small holes to develop, so now it is completely useless. What a waste. I have previously purchased other brands of large stainless steel pots from Amazon.com (Bayou Classic & Concord) and they are much more durable. I’d recommend those other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Dena L.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for maple sap
customer_reviews.text: Help considerably for our maple syrup considering this was our first year and this worked perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hofstetter

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: All in all this is a great buy, could be a touch thicker, but I’m very happy for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Solid Pot.
customer_reviews.text: Very Heavy Duty Meets my expectations I Would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: J. A.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. Using it to boil sap. Great pot for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Frederick

customer_reviews.title: didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: bottom warped and lifted most of the pot off the burner. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Bbqman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. I got the 32qt. It is heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl

customer_reviews.title: Stainless pot.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality stainless steel. Started showing rust spots after steaming shell fish in salted water.
customer_reviews.author: David Beardsley

customer_reviews.title: Powerful monster pot
customer_reviews.text: Used this to sous vid a turkey for Thanksgiving. Awesome! Fit a 19 pound turkey in it. Took 24 hours with a final 30 min roast for the skin.
customer_reviews.author: ShannonFischer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Gas stove would be better because of sheer size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gas One
customer_reviews.text: Initial observation. The pot looks good and feels sturdy for a 70 dollar pot. It came well packaged with no visible defects, dents, warps or scratches. The one area that could be a potential weak point are the handles. Basically the handles are attached to a thin plate held on with 4 small rivets...time will tell. Overall I like the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: It works for boiling water but not for cooking things like apples. I make applesauce and need to cook ...
customer_reviews.text: First, it is a tall pot that looks industrial. I wanted another pot to use as a hot water bath canner and to cook food in. It works for boiling water but not for cooking things like apples. I make applesauce and need to cook the apples before running them through the food mill. The pot warped on the bottom while the apples were cooking and would rock on the burner when trying to stir them. The warp was severe and made stirring dangerous. It went back to flat when it cooled but it is a huge disappointment. Can't trust it for anything other than liquids.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: I'm the envy of pot hounds
customer_reviews.text: This 10 gallon Gasone pot has been met with a lot of interest by my friends. The pot is rock solid. Sturdy. None of this cheap bendy metal that sometimes masquerades as stainless steel. The Gasone pot has weight and a good feel to it. I'm using this pot for dyeing, plan to buy two more, one more for dyeing and another for cooking. I'm so happy with the pot it's amazing. The other excellent thing is the packing for the pot. Gasone provided a sturdy padded box, and that speaks well of the company. They are interested in getting an undamaged product into the hands of their consumers.
customer_reviews.author: gayelle

customer_reviews.title: The lid doesn't fit well
customer_reviews.text: Stainless steel pot is nice. its good and sturdy but I do not like the way the Lid fits it won't stay on the pot you push it down it pops right back Off. In my opinion it's not made well.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Works fine brewing beer on a stove top
customer_reviews.text: I read bad reviews about it being thin or warped. I didn't find this true. I've been to several beer supply shops and this pot is about the same quality as most others. It get's the job done. You can find thicker pots this size but you'll pay at least 3x as much. Cleaned up easy too . I had it on a burner on high for 1.5 hours. No problems. More than big enough for home brewing. I would recommend to anyone beginning brewing. Just a heads up, too big to fit in most sinks.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley L. Crews

customer_reviews.title: Okay pot but bounces all over with liquids!!
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good pot for large quantities. The issue I have is the middle bottom sticks out on the bottom so it doesn't lay flat. When I put liquids inside and turn in the best it jumps all over the place. I probably going to take a sledge and Olympic weight to the bottom until it flattens out. Shouldn't have to do this to a pot this price but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: RDUBPhoto

customer_reviews.title: Cleans easy despite the size
customer_reviews.text: Used it to cook two batches of tamales. Works great. If I could critique one thing it’s that the lid is light so we had to weigh it down but that wasn’t a problem.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Chicken Scalder.
customer_reviews.text: Using this to scale chickens for plucking. Heats up quickly, plenty large enough for Heritage Turkeys as well. Nice and sturdy although not as thick as my calphalon kitchen pots and pans but does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Good for outdoor cooking
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to steam lobsters and corn outside using large propane single burner (turkey frier size). Works very well for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Manitop

customer_reviews.title: Nice pot, and it is huge
customer_reviews.text: Nice pot, and it is huge. I'm using it to boil maple syrup, and will eventually fry/steam food in it too. Very nicely built.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Cagle

customer_reviews.title: OK Pot
customer_reviews.text: Construction is just average but acceptable given the price. I suspect we will be able to use for a couple of years then need to replace.
customer_reviews.author: K. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Have not used yet seem like it is well
customer_reviews.text: Shipped as expected. Have not used yet seem like it is well crafted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for cooking anything!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pot! I cooked corned beef brisket in it! It was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

product_meta.title: GasOne ST-32 Gas One Stainless Steel Stock 8 Gallon with lid/cover & Steamer Rack, Tamale, Dumpling, Crawfish, Crab Pot/Steamer Thickness 1mm Perf, Silver
product_meta.description: Size:8 gallonFrom home-brewing to peanut-boiling, the gas one stainless steel kettle is the perfect fit for your needs. Durable, aesthetically appealing, and reliable, this pot will give you the tool you need to cook whatever your heart desires. With a satin finish, The stainless-steel kettle will both compliment your project area and do its job. Your 32-quart GasOne stainless steel kettle can handle anything you throw at whether it be crab-boiling, or simply just wanting to heat up a huge amount of water. This kettle is a great companion for your cooking! This kettle also comes with a steamer rack—great for keeping things off of the bottom of your kettle while in use!
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY STAINLESS STEEL- Very easy to clean, Long lasting, Safe and durable, Good heat conduction, Sleek look
STURDY THICKNESS- Heavy Duty and thicker than competitors, Commercial grade material, Will last for an extremely long time, Sturdy and durable
SATIN FINISH STAINLESS STEEL- Classic, sleek look; Visually appealing and fitting of any setting, Does not show scuffing or marks, There is no staining and no rusting
HEAVY-DUTY- Extremely strong, dependable and well-constructed, Will last for a very long time, Large pot

COMES WITH LID AND STEAMER RACK-Makes the heat stay in pot, Ensures even levels of heat while cooking, Keeps moisture in pot, Fast cooking and boiling speed, Perfect for cooking Crawfish, Crabs, Home Brewing, Peanut Boiling, and all other cooking activities, Steamer rack for cooking

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars114 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
